_description: Default configuration for automated delta-neutral funding rate farming

capital_management._comment_fraction: Fraction of total available USDT to deploy per position (0.95 = 95%, keeps 5% buffer)

funding_rate_strategy._comment_apr: Minimum effective APR (%) to consider opening a position
funding_rate_strategy._comment_ma: Use moving average for stable signals, periods = number of historical rates (10 = ~3.3 days)

position_management._comment_fee_coverage: Close when funding received >= this multiplier Ã— total fees (1.5 = 150%). Some margin to also cover spreads.
position_management._comment_max_age: Maximum hours to hold a position before forcing rotation
position_management._comment_check_interval: Seconds between position evaluation cycles (300 = 5 minutes)

leverage_settings._comment_leverage: Leverage for perpetual positions (1-3). 1=50/50 split, 2=1/3 perp 2/3 spot, 3=1/4 perp 3/4 spot. Higher leverage = more capital efficiency.
leverage_settings._comment_stop_loss: Emergency stop-loss is calculated AUTOMATICALLY based on leverage with 0.7 safety buffer to prevent liquidation. For 1x: -50%, 2x: -33%, 3x: -24%
